name: Mike & Munk
description:
Mike & Munk is a platform/puzzle game where you control 2 characters: the boy and the squirrel. Jump, shoot the boxes using your teleport gun and try to reach the door. Good luck!

Controls
  • Left and right arrow keys or AD = move
  • Space = replace character
  • W or up arrow key = jump
  • X or J = enable or disable traps
  • R = restart

Contact : magnificstudios10@gmail.com
